name: Burnin' Rubber 5 HD
description: Burnin' Rubber 5 HD is a remastered update of one of the most played action games on the web. Unlock over 30 challenges, 50 cars and multiple explosive weapons. Master 3 different challenge modes and hone your skills to take on the biggest end boss ever.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Newer Processor: 2.0+ GHz Dual core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia or ATI DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Newer Processor: 2.0 GHz Quad core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia or ATI DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
